notification.salesChannelRequired: Please select the sales channel for which the bulk templates are to be processed.

notification.messageSaveError: The item could not be saved.

deleteModal.title: Delete bulk template setting
deleteModal.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the bulk template configuration for this category?

overwriteValues.emptyAndCustomFieldNotSet: SEO setting is still empty AND custom field is not active
overwriteValues.emptyOrCustomFieldNotSet: SEO setting is still empty OR custom field is not active

errors.defaultError: This field can not be empty

helpText.priority: If a product is assigned to several categories, each of which has defined a bulk template, the bulk template with the higher priority is used.
helpText.overwrite:
By default, the SEO settings are only stored by the Bulk Generator if the respective SEO setting is empty. Alternatively, the following conditions can be defined here:

SEO setting is still empty AND custom field is not active:
The bulk is only executed if the SEO setting has not yet been set and the custom field does not have the value "active".

SEO setting is still empty OR custom field is not active:
This is the same as above, but it is sufficient if one of the two conditions applies.

Always execute:
The bulk is always executed.
helpText.overwriteCustomFieldId:
Select the custom field for the condition defined above.

After generation, the custom field selected here is activated.

Some custom fields have already been created with the Shopware installation. However, any custom field that has the type bool and is assigned to the entity can be selected here.

Important note:
A separate custom field must be defined for each sales channel, as the custom fields are saved language-specifically, but not for each sales channel. This applies to the SEO settings "SEO URL"
helpText.inherit: By default, a template is only stored for the current category. This means that a template only applies to the category or, for the Bulk Generator product, to all products in the respective category. If this option is active, the template is also passed on to the subcategories, so that the respective template also applies to these categories.

noTemplate.title: No template defined
noTemplate.message: No bulk template has been saved for this category. Click on Store Bulk Template to define a template for this category.

inheritTemplate.title: Inherits bulk configuration from parent category
inheritTemplate.message:
This category inherits the bulk settings from the {inheritCategoryName}. Accordingly, the bulk template {templateName} is used for this category.

Click on Store bulk template to define your own template for this category.

notification.messageSaveError: The item could not be saved.

titles.templates: Available bulk templates for the selected SEO setting

deletingTemplateInUseModalData.title: Conflict when deleting the template
deletingTemplateInUseModalData.message: The template {templateName} is stored as a bulk template in {total} category (s)
deletingTemplateInUseModalData.deleteButtonText: Also delete the bulk settings of the {total} category (s)

emptyState.title: No bulk templates available yet
emptyState.subline:
No bulk template has been configured for the currently selected SEO setting.
Click on "Create a new bulk template" to create a new one

helpText.aiPrompt:
If this option is enabled, the template is first rendered and then executed as an OpenAI prompt. This is useful if you want to generate dynamic content based on artificial intelligence.

To use this function, an API key from OpenAI is required.

In addition, the OpenAI interface must be installed via Composer.

For more information, see the documentation.

placeholder.previewProduct: Select a product here if you want to use the preview ...

templatePreview.firstSelectProduct: Select a product to see the preview

templateAiPreview.label: OpenAI Preview:
templateAiPreview.generationDisabled: To use the OpenAI preview, please select a preview product and make sure the template is not empty.
templateAiPreview.generationButtonText: Run prompt and generate OpenAI preview
